name: laliga
title: LaLiga
description: A comprehensive extension for tracking La Liga matches, standings, and club information.
author: anhthang

commands.name: standing
commands.title: Standings
commands.description: Discover the ranking of your favorite team and other LaLiga clubs.

commands.name: result
commands.title: Fixtures & Results
commands.description: Find out the results of the last round of LaLiga and the previous ones.

commands.name: other
commands.title: Other Competitions
commands.description: Discover the results of the last round of other competitions, such as UEFA Champions League and Europa League.

commands.name: club
commands.title: Clubs
commands.description: Explore information about LaLiga clubs and their players.

preferences.name: apikey
preferences.title: API Key
preferences.description: Your Ocp-Apim-Subscription-Key for accessing LaLiga data.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
